general.name: spField
general.short: The combined spectra for all exposures of a given field mjd coadd
general.description: The spField files contain the single mjd combined spectra for all exposures of a given field mjd. This is the updated SDSSV version of the spPlate files and analogous to the spField files

surveys.name: BHM
surveys.description: An optical time-domain spectroscopic survey of quasars and X-ray sources

releases.name: DR19
releases.description: SDSS unreleased data.  Represents any work-in-progress data.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

Plugmap structure

FIBERTYPE.name: FIBERTYPE
FIBERTYPE.description: Type of fibre (APOGEE, BOSS, or Metrology)

HOLETYPE.name: HOLETYPE
HOLETYPE.description: Hole ID in which the positioner is sitting

ASSIGNED.name: ASSIGNED
ASSIGNED.description: Whether this fibre was assigned to a target

ON_TARGET.name: ON_TARGET
ON_TARGET.description: Whether this fibre is on target

VALID.name: VALID
VALID.description: alpha and beta angles are valid

DECOLLIDED.name: DECOLLIDED
DECOLLIDED.description: this positioner had to be moved to decollide it

BADSTDMASK.name: BADSTDMASK
BADSTDMASK.description: Standard rejected by magnitude range of design

SCI_EXPTIME.name: SCI_EXPTIME
SCI_EXPTIME.description: Rescaled Science Exposure Time for offset plate

BLUEFIBER.name: BLUEFIBER
BLUEFIBER.description: BOSS to assign this target a 'blue' fiber

XFOCAL.name: XFOCAL
XFOCAL.description: Hole x-axis position in focal plane per exposure

YFOCAL.name: YFOCAL
YFOCAL.description: Hole y-axis position in focal plane per exposure

RACAT.name: RACAT
RACAT.description: Catalog RA in ICRS coordinates at coord_epoch

DECCAT.name: DECCAT
DECCAT.description: Catalog Dec in ICRS coordinates at coord_epoch

PMRA.name: PMRA
PMRA.description: Proper motion in RA (pmra is a true angle)

RA.name: RA
RA.description: Calculated on sky fiber RA including delta_RA

DEC.name: DEC
DEC.description: Calculated on sky fiber Dec including delta_DEC

DELTA_RA.name: DELTA_RA
DELTA_RA.description: The amount in RA this fiber has been offset

DELTA_DEC.name: DELTA_DEC
DELTA_DEC.description: The amount in Dec this fiber has been offset

FIBER_OFFSET.name: FIBER_OFFSET
FIBER_OFFSET.description: Flag identifying the fiber was offset by design

SPECTROGRAPHID.name: SPECTROGRAPHID
SPECTROGRAPHID.description: Spectrograph to which the fibre is assigned. (SDSS-V: 1 = BOSS, 2 = APOGEE) or (SDSS-IV: 1=BOSS SP1, 2=BOSS SP2)

OPTICAL_PROV.name: OPTICAL_PROV
OPTICAL_PROV.description: The source of the CATDB_MAG optical magnitudes

MAG.name: MAG
MAG.description: [u, g, r, i, z] optical magnitudes

PSFMAG.name: PSFMAG
PSFMAG.description: [u, g, r, i, z] optical psf magnitudes

FIBER2MAG.name: FIBER2MAG
FIBER2MAG.description: [u, g, r, i, z] optical Fiber2 magnitudes

CATDB_MAG.name: CATDB_MAG
CATDB_MAG.description: [u, g, r, i, z] Raw TargetDB magnitudes

WISE_MAG.name: WISE_MAG
WISE_MAG.description: WISE [W1, W2, W3, W4] band magnitudes

GRI_GAIA_TRANSFORM.name: GRI_GAIA_TRANSFORM
GRI_GAIA_TRANSFORM.description: provenance of photometry in SDSS-V plate design

OBJTYPE.name: OBJTYPE
OBJTYPE.description: Why object was targetted (QSO = Science Target)

SOURCETYPE.name: SOURCETYPE
SOURCETYPE.description: indicate the nature of the source, one of STAR, QSO, GALAXY, or NA

OBJID.name: OBJID
OBJID.description: Unique object id from SDSS imaging (run,rerun,camCol,field,id)

CARTON_TO_TARGET_PK.name: CARTON_TO_TARGET_PK
CARTON_TO_TARGET_PK.description: SDSS-V Carton_to_Target primary key for SDSSDB

CARTONNAME.name: CARTONNAME
CARTONNAME.description: Main carton from which this carton was drawn

ANCILLARY_TARGET1.name: ANCILLARY_TARGET1
ANCILLARY_TARGET1.description: Targeting bitmask for SDSS-III BOSS Ancillary

ANCILLARY_TARGET2.name: ANCILLARY_TARGET2
ANCILLARY_TARGET2.description: Targeting bitmask for SDSS-III BOSS Ancillary

STARL.name: STARL
STARL.description: likelihood object is star (0-1, Plate OBJECT holes only)

EXPL.name: EXPL
EXPL.description: likelihood object is exponential disk (0-1, Plate OBJECT holes only)

DEVAUCL.name: DEVAUCL
DEVAUCL.description: likelihood object is deVaucouleurs profile (0-1, Plate OBJECT holes only)

RUN.name: RUN
RUN.description: SDSS imaging run, for SDSS imaging targets

RERUN.name: RERUN
RERUN.description: SDSS imaging rerun, for SDSS imaging targets

CAMCOL.name: CAMCOL
CAMCOL.description: SDSS imaging camcol, for SDSS imaging targets

FIELD.name: FIELD
FIELD.description: SDSS imaging field, for SDSS imaging targets

ID.name: ID
ID.description: SDSS imaging id, for SDSS imaging targets

TARGET_INDEX.name: TARGET_INDEX
TARGET_INDEX.description: Index of target on combined spField

MJD_FINAL.name: MJD_FINAL
MJD_FINAL.description: Mean MJD of the Coadded Spectra

MOON_DIST.name: MOON_DIST
MOON_DIST.description: Mean Moon-target separation of Coadded Spectra

MOON_PHASE.name: MOON_PHASE
MOON_PHASE.description: Mean Moon phase of the Coadded Spectra

FIBERID_LIST.name: FIBERID_LIST
FIBERID_LIST.description: List of FiberIDs contributing to Stack

RA_LIST.name: RA_LIST
RA_LIST.description: List of measured RA per exposure

DEC_LIST.name: DEC_LIST
DEC_LIST.description: List of measured DEC per exposure

DELTA_RA_LIST.name: DELTA_RA_LIST
DELTA_RA_LIST.description: List of designed RA offsets per exposure

DELTA_DEC_LIST.name: DELTA_DEC_LIST
DELTA_DEC_LIST.description: List of designed DEC offsets per exposure

EXPTIME.name: EXPTIME
EXPTIME.description: Total Exposure time of Coadded Spectra

FIRSTCARTON_LIST.name: FIRSTCARTON_LIST
FIRSTCARTON_LIST.description: List of Primary SDSS Carton for target per exposure

CARTON_TO_TARGET_PK_LIST.name: CARTON_TO_TARGET_PK_LIST
CARTON_TO_TARGET_PK_LIST.description: List of SDSS-V Carton_to_Target primary key for SDSSDB per exposure

ASSIGNED_LIST.name: ASSIGNED_LIST
ASSIGNED_LIST.description: Whether this fibre was assigned to a target per exposure

ON_TARGET_LIST.name: ON_TARGET_LIST
ON_TARGET_LIST.description: Whether this fibre is on target per exposure

VALID_LIST.name: VALID_LIST
VALID_LIST.description: alpha and beta angles are valid per exposure

DECOLLIDED_LIST.name: DECOLLIDED_LIST
DECOLLIDED_LIST.description: this positioner had to be moved to decollide it per exposure

XFOCAL_LIST.name: XFOCAL_LIST
XFOCAL_LIST.description: Hole/robot x-axis position in focal plane per exposure

YFOCAL_LIST.name: YFOCAL_LIST
YFOCAL_LIST.description: Hole/robot y-axis position in focal plane per exposure

TAI_LIST.name: TAI_LIST
TAI_LIST.description: List Tai for each exposure (at midpoint)

FIELDSNR2G_LIST.name: FIELDSNR2G_LIST
FIELDSNR2G_LIST.description: Overall Field (S/N)^2 in g per exposure

FIELDSNR2R_LIST.name: FIELDSNR2R_LIST
FIELDSNR2R_LIST.description: Overall Field (S/N)^2 in r per exposure

FIELDSNR2I_LIST.name: FIELDSNR2I_LIST
FIELDSNR2I_LIST.description: Overall Field (S/N)^2 in i per exposure

MJDLIST.name: MJDLIST
MJDLIST.description: List of MJD of each included exposures

AIRMASS_LIST.name: AIRMASS_LIST
AIRMASS_LIST.description: Airmass at time of observation per exposure

RMSOFF20.name: RMSOFF20
RMSOFF20.description: mean 20% of RMS offset of guide fibers

RMSOFF20_LIST.description: 20% of RMS offset of guide fibers per exposure

FIBER_RA.description: Fiber RA [J2000 for plate; at exp for FPS]

FIBER_DEC.name: FIBER_DEC

Plugmap structure

FIBERTYPE.name: FIBERTYPE
FIBERTYPE.description: Type of fibre (APOGEE, BOSS, or Metrology)

HOLETYPE.name: HOLETYPE
HOLETYPE.description: Hole ID in which the positioner is sitting

ASSIGNED.name: ASSIGNED
ASSIGNED.description: Whether this fibre was assigned to a target

ON_TARGET.name: ON_TARGET
ON_TARGET.description: Whether this fibre is on target

VALID.name: VALID
VALID.description: alpha and beta angles are valid

DECOLLIDED.name: DECOLLIDED
DECOLLIDED.description: this positioner had to be moved to decollide it

BADSTDMASK.name: BADSTDMASK
BADSTDMASK.description: Standard rejected by magnitude range of design

SCI_EXPTIME.name: SCI_EXPTIME
SCI_EXPTIME.description: Rescaled Science Exposure Time for offset plate

BLUEFIBER.name: BLUEFIBER
BLUEFIBER.description: BOSS to assign this target a 'blue' fiber

XFOCAL.name: XFOCAL
XFOCAL.description: Hole x-axis position in focal plane per exposure

YFOCAL.name: YFOCAL
YFOCAL.description: Hole y-axis position in focal plane per exposure

RACAT.name: RACAT
RACAT.description: Catalog RA in ICRS coordinates at coord_epoch

DECCAT.name: DECCAT
DECCAT.description: Catalog Dec in ICRS coordinates at coord_epoch

PMRA.name: PMRA
PMRA.description: Proper motion in RA (pmra is a true angle)

RA.name: RA
RA.description: Calculated on sky fiber RA including delta_RA

DEC.name: DEC
DEC.description: Calculated on sky fiber Dec including delta_DEC

DELTA_RA.name: DELTA_RA
DELTA_RA.description: The amount in RA this fiber has been offset

DELTA_DEC.name: DELTA_DEC
DELTA_DEC.description: The amount in Dec this fiber has been offset

FIBER_OFFSET.name: FIBER_OFFSET
FIBER_OFFSET.description: Flag identifying the fiber was offset by design

SPECTROGRAPHID.name: SPECTROGRAPHID
SPECTROGRAPHID.description: Spectrograph to which the fibre is assigned. (SDSS-V: 1 = BOSS, 2 = APOGEE) or (SDSS-IV: 1=BOSS SP1, 2=BOSS SP2)

OPTICAL_PROV.name: OPTICAL_PROV
OPTICAL_PROV.description: The source of the CATDB_MAG optical magnitudes

MAG.name: MAG
MAG.description: [u, g, r, i, z] optical magnitudes

PSFMAG.name: PSFMAG
PSFMAG.description: [u, g, r, i, z] optical psf magnitudes

FIBER2MAG.name: FIBER2MAG
FIBER2MAG.description: [u, g, r, i, z] optical Fiber2 magnitudes

CATDB_MAG.name: CATDB_MAG
CATDB_MAG.description: [u, g, r, i, z] Raw TargetDB magnitudes

WISE_MAG.name: WISE_MAG
WISE_MAG.description: WISE [W1, W2, W3, W4] band magnitudes

GRI_GAIA_TRANSFORM.name: GRI_GAIA_TRANSFORM
GRI_GAIA_TRANSFORM.description: provenance of photometry in SDSS-V plate design

OBJTYPE.name: OBJTYPE
OBJTYPE.description: Why object was targetted (QSO = Science Target)

SOURCETYPE.name: SOURCETYPE
SOURCETYPE.description: indicate the nature of the source, one of STAR, QSO, GALAXY, or NA

OBJID.name: OBJID
OBJID.description: Unique object id from SDSS imaging (run,rerun,camCol,field,id)

CARTON_TO_TARGET_PK.name: CARTON_TO_TARGET_PK
CARTON_TO_TARGET_PK.description: SDSS-V Carton_to_Target primary key for SDSSDB

CARTONNAME.name: CARTONNAME
CARTONNAME.description: Main carton from which this carton was drawn

ANCILLARY_TARGET1.name: ANCILLARY_TARGET1
ANCILLARY_TARGET1.description: Targeting bitmask for SDSS-III BOSS Ancillary

ANCILLARY_TARGET2.name: ANCILLARY_TARGET2
ANCILLARY_TARGET2.description: Targeting bitmask for SDSS-III BOSS Ancillary

STARL.name: STARL
STARL.description: likelihood object is star (0-1, Plate OBJECT holes only)

EXPL.name: EXPL
EXPL.description: likelihood object is exponential disk (0-1, Plate OBJECT holes only)

DEVAUCL.name: DEVAUCL
DEVAUCL.description: likelihood object is deVaucouleurs profile (0-1, Plate OBJECT holes only)

RUN.name: RUN
RUN.description: SDSS imaging run, for SDSS imaging targets

RERUN.name: RERUN
RERUN.description: SDSS imaging rerun, for SDSS imaging targets

CAMCOL.name: CAMCOL
CAMCOL.description: SDSS imaging camcol, for SDSS imaging targets

FIELD.name: FIELD
FIELD.description: SDSS imaging field, for SDSS imaging targets

ID.name: ID
ID.description: SDSS imaging id, for SDSS imaging targets

TARGET_INDEX.name: TARGET_INDEX
TARGET_INDEX.description: Index of target on combined spField

MJD_FINAL.name: MJD_FINAL
MJD_FINAL.description: Mean MJD of the Coadded Spectra

MOON_DIST.name: MOON_DIST
MOON_DIST.description: Mean Moon-target separation of Coadded Spectra

MOON_PHASE.name: MOON_PHASE
MOON_PHASE.description: Mean Moon phase of the Coadded Spectra

FIBERID_LIST.name: FIBERID_LIST
FIBERID_LIST.description: List of FiberIDs contributing to Stack

RA_LIST.name: RA_LIST
RA_LIST.description: List of measured RA per exposure

DEC_LIST.name: DEC_LIST
DEC_LIST.description: List of measured DEC per exposure

DELTA_RA_LIST.name: DELTA_RA_LIST
DELTA_RA_LIST.description: List of designed RA offsets per exposure

DELTA_DEC_LIST.name: DELTA_DEC_LIST
DELTA_DEC_LIST.description: List of designed DEC offsets per exposure

EXPTIME.name: EXPTIME
EXPTIME.description: Total Exposure time of Coadded Spectra

FIRSTCARTON_LIST.name: FIRSTCARTON_LIST
FIRSTCARTON_LIST.description: List of Primary SDSS Carton for target per exposure

CARTON_TO_TARGET_PK_LIST.name: CARTON_TO_TARGET_PK_LIST
CARTON_TO_TARGET_PK_LIST.description: List of SDSS-V Carton_to_Target primary key for SDSSDB per exposure

ASSIGNED_LIST.name: ASSIGNED_LIST
ASSIGNED_LIST.description: Whether this fibre was assigned to a target per exposure

ON_TARGET_LIST.name: ON_TARGET_LIST
ON_TARGET_LIST.description: Whether this fibre is on target per exposure

VALID_LIST.name: VALID_LIST
VALID_LIST.description: alpha and beta angles are valid per exposure

DECOLLIDED_LIST.name: DECOLLIDED_LIST
DECOLLIDED_LIST.description: this positioner had to be moved to decollide it per exposure

XFOCAL_LIST.name: XFOCAL_LIST
XFOCAL_LIST.description: Hole/robot x-axis position in focal plane per exposure

YFOCAL_LIST.name: YFOCAL_LIST
YFOCAL_LIST.description: Hole/robot y-axis position in focal plane per exposure

TAI_LIST.name: TAI_LIST
TAI_LIST.description: List Tai for each exposure (at midpoint)

FIELDSNR2G_LIST.name: FIELDSNR2G_LIST
FIELDSNR2G_LIST.description: Overall Field (S/N)^2 in g per exposure

FIELDSNR2R_LIST.name: FIELDSNR2R_LIST
FIELDSNR2R_LIST.description: Overall Field (S/N)^2 in r per exposure

FIELDSNR2I_LIST.name: FIELDSNR2I_LIST
FIELDSNR2I_LIST.description: Overall Field (S/N)^2 in i per exposure

MJDLIST.name: MJDLIST
MJDLIST.description: List of MJD of each included exposures

AIRMASS_LIST.name: AIRMASS_LIST
AIRMASS_LIST.description: Airmass at time of observation per exposure

RMSOFF20.name: RMSOFF20
RMSOFF20.description: mean 20% of RMS offset of guide fibers

RMSOFF20_LIST.name: RMSOFF20_LIST
RMSOFF20_LIST.description: 20% of RMS offset of guide fibers per exposure

RMSOFF50.name: RMSOFF50
RMSOFF50.description: mean 50% of RMS offset of guide fibers

RMSOFF50_LIST.name: RMSOFF50_LIST
RMSOFF50_LIST.description: 50% of RMS offset of guide fibers per exposure

RMSOFF80.name: RMSOFF80
RMSOFF80.description: mean 80% of RMS offset of guide fibers

RMSOFF80_LIST.name: RMSOFF80_LIST
RMSOFF80_LIST.description: 80% of RMS offset of guide fibers per exposure

FIBER_RA.name: FIBER_RA
FIBER_RA.description: Fiber RA [J2000 for plate; at exp for FPS]

FIBER_DEC.name: FIBER_DEC
FIBER_DEC.description: Fiber DEC [J2000 for plate; at exp for FPS]
